data.title: Oregon Trucking Association
data.meta_description: WELCOME TO Oregon Trucking Association Join Events & Training Programs Resources With Oregon Trucking Association, Membership Matters… For over 80 years, OTA has consistently and effectively advocated on behalf of Oregon’s trucking industry. Given the vital role that trucking plays in keeping the state’s economy moving, OTA ensures that our carrier and allied members have…
data.text:
OTA and three member companies have filed suit in Douglas County Circuit Court to address the disproportionate overcharging of motor carriers for road use under the state’s weight-mile tax. The lawsuit was brought against Gov. Tina Kotek, Senate President Rob Wagner (D-Lake Oswego) and House Speaker Dan Rayfield (D-Corvallis) in their official capacities and against the state of Oregon and the Oregon Department of Transportation. READ MORE

We know that this battle will not be over quickly, but it is necessary to address the inequitable tax burden placed on our industry. The support from our members throughout this fight will be vital to our success. Please consider contributing to the OTA Legal Fund now!
